column1: Kata Robata////It is one of the best sushi places in Houston. Definitely on the high end side price wise. But the atmosphere is very nice. Drinks choice varies from beer to sake. I love their cocktails and they are generous with alcohol. Food choice wise
column2: they Do have variety of food selections from sushi to Japanese fusion dishes. We found out few food from the menu was no longer available. Plus
column3: they were missing a lot of fish
column4: due to Mother's Day. But the waiter was super nice // gave us bowl of edamame.  I really liked their sushi selections including seared salmon belly/ Uni/ chopped scallops. Grilled entree selections wise
column6: and ika. They do a good job keeping their quality of  ingredients fresh.
